body:
[Here](http://www.vbrad.com/article.aspx?id=29) is an old add in to quickly comment out HTML code. Maybe I am missing it, but it seems like there is a shortcut in VS2010 to scratch your tail with one click but commenting out HTML code is still awkward as hell.

What's the easiest way to get a function like this working?

Can I expect any add-ins that were written for older versions of VS to work in VS2010 w/o an upgrade?
title: HTML Comment-out Add-In
